column5: So I'm shopping for waders (anyone got a used pair, size 10 or so) and looking at what CTC has to offer. Why is it they always show people that have no idea how to hold a rod and reel. How many of you have seen this type of thing before? Note;spinning reel upside down
Seen lots of people fish with them that way...because they didn't know the handle can be swttched left to right ! lol
Kind of gives a hint how much fishing time that guy has under his waders?

I watched a CO before pinch someone for fishing with no liscence..he pointed to a rod that was in the water, asked if it was the guy who just got pinched rod.  The guy tells him yes. The CO picks up the rod, looks at it funny, then flips it upside down and reeled it in  , it was pretty funny.....can't handle a spinning outfit, but he was sportin' a side arm and bulletproof vest
Great post!  One of those things that I always immediately notice but never mention.  Made me laugh.
Im callin CTC right now.  Ill stand in the dang waders and hold the reel right for 100 bucks....
lol what are you talking about, that's a real creek bank, and real rocks in that photo!  Don't you dress just like that when you're steelheading in the first week of march?
Check out those cheesy fake rocks and that silly forest backdrop..  LMAO!!  Thanks for the funny. HD
I'm guessing you don't work at Stelco. Jim
MODEL!  I was expecting a blond with big bobbers!
i laugh when i see people fishing like that then i think how do they do it
i figured i'd catch a few of you on that.

There was/is an tv add for some outdoor paint ( I won't name it, because they don't deserve free advertising for being bozos) It's been running for years in Canada. The guy is sitting on the metal "deck" chair that needs to be painted with product X, fishing with spinning reel upside down. Year after year, after year.  It's not just the model or actor its 25 people standing behind the camera or approving the add at head office.  Ahhhh all better. Thank you.
yes, i remember that one as well...like i said, sometimes you see this stuff and just shake your head.
